Class ManualRouter

Namespace
FlowGraph.Core.Routing
Assembly
FlowGraph.Core.dll

Routes edges using user-defined waypoints without automatic path calculation. Used when Manual is set.

public class ManualRouter : IEdgeRouter
Inheritance
object
ManualRouter
Implements
IEdgeRouter

object.Equals(object)

object.GetType()
object.MemberwiseClone()
object.ReferenceEquals(object, object)
object.ToString()

Remarks

This router simply interpolates through the user's waypoints without obstacle avoidance. For guided routing that respects waypoints while avoiding obstacles, use OrthogonalRouter with Guided mode.
